snippet: The idea behind the center is that battered spouses can speak to a prosecutor about assault charges, and can also receive legal help and counseling on a host of other issues.
abstract: Manhattan Family Justice Center opens in renovated suite in Manhattan district attorney's office; center brings prosecutors, myriad city agencies and nonprofits that provide counseling, together under one roof; idea is to remove a major hurdle to women trying to escape an abusive spouse--the daunting task of going all over New York City to make criminal complaints, find housing and visit social-service agencies.
lead_paragraph: The idea behind the center is that battered spouses can speak to a prosecutor about assault charges, and can also receive legal help and counseling on a host of other issues.

headline.main: Center That Aids Domestic Violence Victims Opens in Manhattan
